title: 381: Britney’s Pregnant! JLo’s Engaged! And We Need Parenting Help!
itunes:title: 381: Britney’s Pregnant! JLo’s Engaged! And We Need Parenting Help!
description:
Today The Broads are joined by Kate Casey (Reality Life w/ Kate Casey) to discuss some BIG pop culture news! But first they chat one on one about Jess’ grandma giving everything away, Bekah’s weekend alone, and feeling like a bad parent and their parenting fears. Then Kate joins and The Broads discover how she’s helped some Housewives during Reunions, Britney Spears’ pregnancy, JLo and Ben’s engagement (how Kate was involved) and the ring, Avril and Mod Sun getting married, Billy Ray and Tish’s 3rd divorce (from each other), the WILD Clayton rumor, and more!

 

KATE CASEY:

Listen to “Reality Life with Kate Casey” here: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/reality-life-with-kate-casey/id1154758766

Follow Kate on Instagram here: https://www.instagram.com/katecaseyca/

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
